exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat sigma : name -> data st' : data Hlocks : forall n : Client_index, held (sigma (Client n)) = true -> exists t : list Client_index, queue (sigma Server) = n :: t Hqueue : forall c : Client_index, at_head_of_queue sigma c -> at_head_of_queue (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st') c c : Client_index HatHead : held (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st' (Client c)) = true The term "Client c" has type "Name" while it is expected to have type "name".

original: intros sigma st' Hlocks Hqueue. unfold locks_correct in *. intros c HatHead. destruct (name_eq_dec (Client c) Server) as [Heq | Hneq]. + rewrite Heq. apply Hlocks. apply HatHead. + apply locks_correct_update_true; auto.
